lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Currently farmers enrolling in the program are required to set aside 20 pct of their base acreage and then are eligible for payments of two dlrs per bushel by idling an additional 15 pct of their acreage.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: U.S. corn acreage this year is likely to drop to the lowest level since the unsurpassed acreage reductions of the 1983 PIK year and could rank as one of the lowest corn plantings in the United States in sixty years, Agriculture Department officials said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A severe drought that summer in major producing states caused yields to tumble and final crop production to total only 4.2 billion bushels.

lst.name: sentence
